articles.title: Ecuador prison clash leaves at least 17 dead
articles.summary: This aerial view shows a prison in Esmeraldas, Ecuador, on Thursday. Clashes between rival drug gangs claimed at least 17 lives in the second deadly riot in an Ecuadoran prison in days, penitentiary officials in the violence-wracked South American country said.
